resources.string: Carry out food and nutritional security programs for the most vulnerable population. Additionally, implement education, health and entrepreneurship strategies that promote the comprehensive development of the families.

In 2025 we will be recognized in the national and international level for our excellent comprehensive work against malnutrition of Colombian children, promoting opportunities and the social inclusion of the communities served.
With you I build a decent life
Transparency and Efficiency Responsibility Solidarity Reliability Human Quality

nu3 Foundation was constituted on December 5, 2005 in the city of Barranquilla, Colombia. The Foundation arises in response to the need experienced by a large percentage of infant population in Barranquilla and the Atlantico Department, to have access to food with the adequate nutritional and energetic content necessary for their normal growth and development.

 In this manner, more than providing food and applying an educational model, nu3 Foundation works for the happiness of our beneficiaries, their present and the construction of a better future surrounded by equality, fairness, satisfied basic needs and a quality of life with opportunities for progress.

 Nu3 Foundation comprehensively provides services to more than 19,000 children every year. We serve children (boys and girls), pregnant and breastfeeding mothers, seniors, youngsters and their families, providing Food and Nutritional Security Programs, supplemented with strategies in Health, Education and Income Generation. Initially we served 35 children in the Santamaria Neighborhood Cafeteria in the city of Barranquilla, when we established Foundation’s first cafeteria. Now our interventions cover the Departments of Atlántico, Bolívar, Magdalena, Chocó, Córdoba and Guajira.
